mapper.delete: DELETE FROM agile_issue_link WHERE issue_id = #{issueId} OR linked_issue_id = #{issueId}
mapper.select: SELECT ail.* FROM agile_issue_link ail WHERE ail.issue_id IN ( SELECT ai.issue_id FROM agile_issue ai WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND ai.apply_type = 'test' AND ai.type_code IN ( 'issue_test', 'issue_auto_test' ) )

SELECT aii.*, flisl.id as linkSettingId, flisl.status_id, flisl.link_issue_status_id, flisl.is_triggered FROM ( SELECT ail.issue_id, ail.linked_issue_id, ail.link_type_id, ai.issue_type_id, ai1.issue_type_id AS link_issue_type_id, ail.project_id FROM agile_issue_link ail LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai ON ai.issue_id = ail.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai1 ON ai1.issue_id = ail.linked_issue_id WHERE ail.project_id = #{projectId} ) aii LEFT JOIN fd_link_issue_status_linkage flisl ON flisl.project_id = #{projectId} AND flisl.link_type_id = aii.link_type_id AND aii.issue_type_id = flisl.issue_type_id AND aii.link_issue_type_id = flisl.link_issue_type_id WHERE flisl.status_id IS NOT NULL
